body:
I suggest that you introduce a way to keep track of all played game/games won/games lost/ games draw.

I think it won't be hard.

In the 1st versions of Magarena there were the number of cards each cube has in front of each cube type.

I even don't know now how many cards Magarena support.

Can you put the number of cards each cube support in front of each cube?

THX. Nice job you're doing...

comments.body:
I started working on this.

For now I'll focus on storing :
games played
games won
games lost
duels completed
duels won
duels lost

and if that works then maybe add more data. This will be stored in a new folder, each player name in a separate file, e.g.
Magarena/history/beholder.hist
Magarena/history/pedro.hist
etc.

The easiest way of showing this information, in my opinion, will be a new window, opened from the menu bar.

**Status:** Started
